alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:33PM CDT until June 14 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Southern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Northeastern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 933 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moorhead to near Isola to Arcola, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Itta Bena, Morgan City and Swiftown around 940 PM CDT. Quito around 945 PM CDT. Greenwood and Sidon around 950 PM CDT. Cruger and Seven Pines around 955 PM CDT. Belzoni around 1000 PM CDT. Coila and Black Hawk around 1005 PM CDT. Tchula, Emory and Bowling Green around 1015 PM CDT. Vaiden and Howard around 1020 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
